Bet 21
We are delighted to introduce the coin for sports fanatics which brings together the Sports, Cryptocurrency Community and NFT Market. The craze of sports among people is through the roof and keeps on increasing. Bet21 is designed taking into consideration the fun-loving aspects of the same.
Buy Now

ABOUT Bet21

Why Choose Bet21


Bet21 is a sports based community token. It is developed to create a trustworthy place for the sports lovers

Our main objective is to create a place where people feel safe to invest and hold their money and further, they can use the crypto for prizes, betting, staking and sports ticketing.

Our focus is entirely dedicated to sports lovers, and we strive for their betterment. Players can engage themselves with new upcoming elements.

Players can engage themselves with new upcoming elements. We are planning to introduce two distinct elements, namely Lottery and Betting



Our Offerings

Betting

One of a kind of betting algorithm that will allow players to predict winning teams and the score bands , as well as betting on player performance. Bets placed will be allocated in a better pool from which rewards will be distributed to the winners.

What more?
Referral Rewards:

Invite your friends and earn up to 5% of their winnings.

Lottery

Bet21 is a lottery platform that lets players deposit Bet21 tokens into pools and buy tickets. Every pool holds a weekly draw that awards a pool prize of upto 5 winners.

But do you know the best part?
Your tickets do not expire

Which means, it is a no loss lottery, beacause the tickets roll over to the next draw, and so on and so forth until you win or withdraw your funds from the pool.

TOKENOMICS

Supply Burning



Burn reducing supply

3% burn which reduces the supply on every transaction. Supply is 50,000 Token and the Burn will be till 35000 Token which means, Rise in price and stability.

Buy Back



Top holders benifits

3% of Tax will be used for 1% Buy Back, 1% Marketting & 1% Top Holders Rewards No need to farm, stake or fill out claim forms.

Auto Reflection



Directly on your wallet

2%Tax will be Redistributed among Holders, The more Token you hold, the more rewards you will receive on every transaction.

Eco System

Bet21 is an upcoming advanced online sports betting and ticketing platform focused at bringing cryptocurrency and smart contract-based protocols to the sport mainstreams. The platform is powered by the Binance Smart Chain for transactions to provide users speed along with flexibility. BSC is an advanced blockchain solution for smart contract that permits fast transactions on a low fee.
